page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: There is a wide variety of clubs in the area catering for all ages and interests.There are clubs for young mothers e.g.Mother and Toddler Group, Post Natal Support Group and many play groups.For the older community there is a Darby & Joan Club,day centres and similiar facilities.The British Legion is active in the area and similiar groups.For youngsters there are a number of organisations e.g.The Boys Brigade,Girl Guides,Scouts etc.There is a club run by St.Mary's Church called Centre 13 which has various activities, particulary in the school holidays.This is one of many groups that hold holiday and other youth activies.There are a number of charitable organisations like 'Meals on Wheels',W.V.S. and money raising groups such as P.T.A.'s,and self-help groups e.g.Weight Watchers.
